html:
7.19.19  6:21 pm   Please, please, please be so kind and answer this question Bill!

Preamble: you generate a ton of files: text files for ideas, journals, lyrics, scripts, etc etc, images, pictures, screenshots, audio recordings, video recordings, combinations of all of the above when you start editing and putting them together, and all the other things I'm probably missing.

Actual question: how do you organize all that?

      Final rant: I feel that so many of my ideas and projects get stuck just because my laptop is a mess, I have files all over the place, and an organizing system that has a lot of room for improvement and I use only inconsistently. I don't know exactly how or where to start improving this. I'm also afraid that organizing could be a very long project in of itself. HELP!

Thanks a lot!
